description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. DarkSeal is a strategic war game using the armies and the magic. You have to cooperate with the other magicians to protect the seal. But you also have to betray them to become  the new Dark lord.  Up to four players
